name: postRender
description: Queue and render the contents of a timeline as a video, image or audio file.

body.description:
The video, image or audio edit specified using JSON.

**base URL:** https://api.shotstack.io/{version}

$block: The response received after a [render request](#render-asset) is submitted. The render task is queued for rendering and a unique render id is returned.

$ul: **response**: The response data returned with the [QueuedResponse](#tocs_queuedresponse).
**id**: The id of the render task in UUID format.
**message**: Success response message or error details.
